Sentencas: Electrochemical CO2 reduction to CO by using solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) is a promising option to produce useable fuels using renewable energy.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction to CO using solid oxide electrolysis cells with high-performance Ta-doped bismuth strontium ferrite air electrode

Sentencas: However, traditional cobalt-based air electrodes exhibit high thermal-expansion coefficients and a tendency of Co segregation, compromising long-term stability.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction to CO using solid oxide electrolysis cells with high-performance Ta-doped bismuth strontium ferrite air electrode

Sentencas: Here, Co-free Bi0.5Sr0.5FeO3-delta perovskite was explored with Ta doping into the B-site as the air electrode (BSFTx).
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction to CO using solid oxide electrolysis cells with high-performance Ta-doped bismuth strontium ferrite air electrode

Sentencas: Doping Ta enabled a decrease in polarization resistance by 45% from 0.31 Omega cm(2) to 0.17 Omega cm(2) at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction to CO using solid oxide electrolysis cells with high-performance Ta-doped bismuth strontium ferrite air electrode

Sentencas: The distribution function of relaxation times analysis suggested that the observed improvements can be ascribed to the enhanced mass-transfer processes, which include oxygen diffusion, association, and desorption.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction to CO using solid oxide electrolysis cells with high-performance Ta-doped bismuth strontium ferrite air electrode

Sentencas: The performance of a cathode-supported Ni-YSZ (ytttria-stabilized zirconia)vertical bar YSZ vertical bar Gd-doped ceria vertical bar BSFTx cell was characterized by an electrolysis current of -0.81 A cm(-2) under 1.5 V at 800 degrees C, which corresponds to a CO-production rate of 4.2 x 10(3) nmol s(-1) cm(-2) and an electrical efficiency of 98%.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction to CO using solid oxide electrolysis cells with high-performance Ta-doped bismuth strontium ferrite air electrode

Sentencas: Excellent stability of the cell was also demonstrated by steady current density during the 32-h test executed under 1.2 V at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction to CO using solid oxide electrolysis cells with high-performance Ta-doped bismuth strontium ferrite air electrode

Sentencas: The nearly 100% electrical efficiency and the satisfactory performance and stability of SOEC with Ta-doped BSF air electrode indicated its potential use in CO2 reduction technique.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction to CO using solid oxide electrolysis cells with high-performance Ta-doped bismuth strontium ferrite air electrode
